column1: Little Goat Diner////If you like a little bit of ethnic flare to your diner food and like being adventurous
column2: you'll love Little Goat Diner! I've been meaning to eat here for awhile
column3: and the diner did not disappoint. I love how Little Goat serves a variety of food
column4: especially brunch food... the best meal of the day.
